co2-emissions.title: Fossil Fuel CO₂ Emissions
co2-emissions.description: Model-estimated monthly, 1 km resolution CO₂ emissions from fossil fuel combustion, cement production and gas flaring created using space-based nighttime light data and individual power plant emission/location profiles.
